DOC.brief_summary: Randomized nine month clinical comparison implantation Taxol eluting ( Taxus Express ) Sirolimus elute ( Cypher Select ) stents non-selected patient coronary artery disease .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Cypher Select Taxus Express Coronary Stents
DOC.detailed_description: Design : - Randomized open multicentre trial . Patients : - 1800 patient coronary artery disease schedule percutaneous coronary intervention stent implantation . Inclusion criterion : - Patients coronary artery disease schedule percutaneous coronary intervention stent implantation . - Signed informed consent . Exclusion criterion : - Participation stent study . Randomization : - Implantation Taxus Express og Cypher Select stent . Primary end-point : - Combined end-point cardiac death , new revascularization ( PCI CABG ) myocardial infarction nine month . Secondary end-points : - Total death nine month - Cardiac death nine month - Myocardial infarction nine month - Index vessel myocardial infarction nine month - Target lesion revascularization - Target vessel revascularization - Stent thrombosis nine month End-point evaluation : - End-points adjudicated independent end-point committee
DOC.criteria: Planned implantation drug elute stent Written inform consent Planned intervention stent study stent
